lead_paragraph: When a BBC announcer suggested that a Brazilian broadcaster needed to shut up at the start of a swimming race at the Rio Olympics, he was voicing the feelings of many in the host country.

headline.main: An Olympic Message to the Brazilian Bob Costas: Shut It!
headline.print_headline: An Olympic Message to the Brazilian Bob Costas: Shut It!

snippet: When a BBC announcer suggested that a Brazilian broadcaster needed to shut up at the start of a swimming race at the Rio Olympics, he was voicing the feelings of many in the host country....
